name: UIPress.PressType
desc: Constants that represent buttons that a user can press.

items.name: case playPause
items.desc: A constant that represents the play/pause button.

items.name: case select
items.desc: A constant that represents the select button.

items.name: case menu
items.desc: A constant that represents the menu button.

items.name: case upArrow
items.desc: A constant that represents the up arrow button.

items.name: case downArrow
items.desc: A constant that represents the down arrow button.

items.name: case leftArrow
items.desc: A constant that represents the left arrow button.

items.name: case rightArrow
items.desc: A constant that represents the right arrow button.

items.name: case pageDown
items.desc: A constant that represents the page down button.

items.name: case pageUp
items.desc: A constant that represents the page up button.
